mapper.sql: api_ukid, api_name, api_desc, api_status, api_type, api_version, api_service_ukid, add_time, update_time
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from gw_manage_api
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert:
insert into gw_manage_api
api_ukid,
api_name,
api_desc,
api_status,
api_type,
api_version,
api_service_ukid,
add_time,
update_time,
#{apiUkid,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{apiName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{apiDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{apiStatus,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{apiType,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{apiVersion,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{apiServiceUkid,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{addTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
mapper.update:
update gw_manage_api
api_ukid = #{record.apiUkid,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
api_name = #{record.apiName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
api_desc = #{record.apiDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
api_status = #{record.apiStatus,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
api_type = #{record.apiType,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
api_version = #{record.apiVersion,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
api_service_ukid = #{record.apiServiceUkid,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
add_time = #{record.addTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{record.updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

update gw_manage_api set api_ukid = #{record.apiUkid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, api_name = #{record.apiName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, api_desc = #{record.apiDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, api_status = #{record.apiStatus,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, api_type = #{record.apiType,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, api_version = #{record.apiVersion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, api_service_ukid = #{record.apiServiceUkid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, add_time = #{record.addTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{record.updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}

update gw_manage_api
api_name = #{apiName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
api_desc = #{apiDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
api_status = #{apiStatus,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
api_type = #{apiType,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
api_version = #{apiVersion,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
api_service_ukid = #{apiServiceUkid,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
add_time = #{addTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where api_ukid = #{apiUkid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update gw_manage_api set api_name = #{apiName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, api_desc = #{apiDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, api_status = #{apiStatus,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, api_type = #{apiType,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, api_version = #{apiVersion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, api_service_ukid = #{apiServiceUkid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, add_time = #{addTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where api_ukid = #{apiUkid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select: select gma.api_version as "version", gs.service_version as methodVersion from gw_manage_api gma join gw_service gs on gma.api_service_ukid = service_ukid where gs.service_name = #{serviceName} group by gma.api_version, gs.service_version

select gs.service_ukid as methodUkid, gma.api_name as wayKeyName, gs.service_key as methodName, gs.service_group as methodGroup, gs.service_retry as retry, gs.is_async as async, gs.is_test as test, gs.test_ip as testIp, gs.test_port as testPort, gs.service_type as protocol, gs.service_desc as "desc", gs.time_out as timeOut from gw_manage_api gma join gw_service gs on gma.api_service_ukid = gs.service_ukid where gma.api_version = #{gwInterfaceVO.version} and gs.service_version = #{gwInterfaceVO.methodVersion} and gs.service_name = #{interfaceName}
mapper.delete:
delete from gw_manage_api where api_service_ukid in
#{item}
